refnamediv.refpurpose: Seeks to specific location in a stream

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public boolstreamWrapper::stream_seek intoffset intwhence SEEK_SET
This method is called in response to fseek.
The read/write position of the stream should be updated according to the offset and whence.

&reftitle.parameters;
offset
The stream offset to seek to.
whence
Possible values:
SEEK_SET - Set position equal to offset bytes. SEEK_CUR - Set position to current location plus offset. SEEK_END - Set position to end-of-file plus offset.
The current implementation never sets whence to SEEK_CUR; instead such seeks are internally converted to SEEK_SET seeks.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Return &true; if the position was updated, &false; otherwise.
